name: Primeape

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.effect: Deal 10 more damage per damage counter on Primeape.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.effect: Deal 30 damage to the Defending Pokemon twice. Apply effects, weakness, and resistance as if this were two attacks.

flavor: This ape is quite piglike. Point that out to it and you will likely get your ass beat.
